Type.BattleDialog: You may be bound at the moment, but I will cut all those strings for you.
…It’s time for a little puppetry.
We will reach that world by every and all means necessary.
In the end… The strings couldn’t be released…
What a pain. You’re being rather violent…
You’re damaging my puppets.
Does it hurt to play along?
That puppet is now useless…
It’s such a pity that I can’t make a puppet out of you.
Don’t you want to cut down your strings and gain freedom as well?
…Puppets. The end is near.
That didn’t live up to the reputation.
Gigigigigig.
Grgrgr. Grgrg.
Gygygy… Gyg.
Grgrgrgrgrg. Grgr.
Gygygyg. Grgrg. Gig.
Gigigi…
Grgrgr. Grgrgrgr.
Gii ghghghghgh… Ghgh.
Gigigigigi. Gigigig…
Gigig… Ghghgh… Gii…
Gigigi… Gigig…
Grgrgr… Grgrgrgrgrg…
Gy… Gygygyg…
Gigigigigig…
Grgrgrgrgrgrg…
Ghghghgh. Gygygygygy. Gh.
Grgrgr… Gigigi… Gigigigigig…
Gig… Gigigi… Gygygygy… Grgh.
Gigigigigi… Gig… Ghghghghg.
Ghghghgh. Gigi… Gigigigigi.
Gigigigi… Gig.
Ghgh.
Gigigigigi. Ghghghghgh…
Ghghghghghgh… Gigi…
Gigi… Gig… Ghghgh… Gigigigigig.
Don’t sweat it~ I think it’s best not to get too nervous.
A free world where all the strings are loose, is it…
I guess I wasn’t good enough to stop them…
Let’s not be impatient. I think we can still make it.
I’m sure it wasn’t a pointless sacrifice.
…If not for us, no one will keep them at bay.
Stand back for a bit if you’re exhausted.
Things are going smooth, it seems~
I guess there’s no time to slow down…
Everyone. Let’s take it up a notch~
It looks like we can wrap this up soon enough~
Can we… really make it? I’m kind of anxious.
It seems we’ve done it somehow… Yeah?
I’m sure the others… can… deal with…
When are we gonna be done with this kind of pain?
A moment of silence.
I’m… It’s gonna be alright. We can make them stop for sure.
That took some effort, but…
Let’s deal with them in haste.
I’ve taken care of this one, let me lend a hand with the others.
We’re supposed to defeat them, right?
I—Is it actually over?
At least I didn’t… get in my allies’ way.
We need some room to breathe.
One of us has gotta stay sharp.
I think we should keep our focus on the fight for now.
…Nailed it!
It completely broke…
I’m not letting a puppet on dinky strings get me…
The sound alone creeps me out now.
I wonder if killing the Puppeteer actually frees the puppets?
Dammit… I can’t move anymore…
How did this… happen?
Mister Chesed… What should we do now…?
Maybe this was a bad idea…
This isn’t all that rough, is it?
They can’t move once the strings are cut.
Can’t let the same thing happen to me…
…Those horrid puppets are back.
Whew… The master of the puppets wasn’t even that strong.
Hopefully… this will be taken care of…
…We should fight back before they hit us even harder.
You faced up to your responsibility. That’s all that needs to be said.
I’ll have to take heart for them…
Are we… cutting off their strings?
Those puppets are pretty unfortunate when you think about it.
…Got it! We’re making good progress.
